title: Must Read: Sofia Coppola's First Documentary Will Follow Marc Jacobs, Condé Nast Quietly Shuts Down Vogue Club
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday.  At this year's Venice International Film Festival, Sofia Coppola will release her first documentary, spotlighting none other than her close friend, Marc Jacobs. "Marc by Sofia" will follow the duo's friendship over the years, ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
